translation: Defeat the Cerberus!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Cerberus!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Titan!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Titan!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Make your way to the top of Mt. Whatever.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Make your way to the top of Mt. Whatever.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Uuungh. More climbing? How much{LF}farther do we have to go?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Uuungh. More climbing? How much{LF}farther do we have to go?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Why don't you hop on?{LF}I can fly us up there in a flash!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Why don't you hop on?{LF}I can fly us up there in a flash!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Because it's cold and you smell{LF}like a dead bear's ass?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Because it's cold and you smell{LF}like a dead bear's ass?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Oh. Then how 'bout I breathe{LF}fire to warm you up?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: ...Oh. Then how 'bout I breathe{LF}fire to warm you up?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Let's think about that plan{LF}for a second, shall we?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Let's think about that plan{LF}for a second, shall we?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ugh, this is such a pain in the ass!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Ugh, this is such a pain in the ass!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Then we must be getting close to something!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Then we must be getting close to something!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: The more bad guys they throw at you,{LF}the more they wanna guard stuff, right?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: The more bad guys they throw at you,{LF}the more they wanna guard stuff, right?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Look at that. Big baby actually{LF}went and learned something.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Look at that. Big baby actually{LF}went and learned something.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: So what'll you do once you track down Four?{#Name="Dito"}
source: So what'll you do once you track down Four?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Kill her.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Kill her.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That's it? Booo-ring!{LF}You should have a little fun with her first!{#Name="Dito"}
source: That's it? Booo-ring!{LF}You should have a little fun with her first!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: {#Name="ディト"}
source: {#Name="ディト"}

translation: Like, find her greatest shame and then tell{LF}everyone she knows until she begs you to{LF}kill her so the humiliation can finally end!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Like, find her greatest shame and then tell{LF}everyone she knows until she begs you to{LF}kill her so the humiliation can finally end!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You're a sick puppy, aren't you?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You're a sick puppy, aren't you?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Aw, thanks!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Aw, thanks!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: コイツ、やだ。馬鹿力すぎ！{#Name="ディト"}
source: コイツ、やだ。馬鹿力すぎ！{#Name="ディト"}

translation: キミは力が無いからな{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: キミは力が無いからな{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: 男みたいな力強さって、僕には必要ないね{#Name="ディト"}
source: 男みたいな力強さって、僕には必要ないね{#Name="ディト"}

translation: 抱くより抱かれる方が好みだし…ふふっ{#Name="ディト"}
source: 抱くより抱かれる方が好みだし…ふふっ{#Name="ディト"}

translation: 戦闘中に思い出し笑いはよせ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 戦闘中に思い出し笑いはよせ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: 雑魚に用はないんだよ！とっととフォウを出しやがれ！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 雑魚に用はないんだよ！とっととフォウを出しやがれ！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: うらああああああッ！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: うらああああああッ！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: うわー。すごい気合いだね！{#Name="ディト"}
source: うわー。すごい気合いだね！{#Name="ディト"}

translation: これならフォウを殺すときも期待出来るなあ{#Name="ディト"}
source: これならフォウを殺すときも期待出来るなあ{#Name="ディト"}

translation: 楽しみにしておけ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 楽しみにしておけ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: はぁはぁはぁ…{#Name="ディト"}
source: はぁはぁはぁ…{#Name="ディト"}

translation: 息があがってるね。体力残しておかなきゃ、この先死ぬよ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 息があがってるね。体力残しておかなきゃ、この先死ぬよ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: お、大きなお世話。僕なりの、戦い方が、あるっての{#Name="ディト"}
source: お、大きなお世話。僕なりの、戦い方が、あるっての{#Name="ディト"}

translation: ふむ…その負けん気はよろしい{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ふむ…その負けん気はよろしい{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: You're slowing me down. Move it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You're slowing me down. Move it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Um, hey, Zero? Can I ask you a favor? {#Name="Dito"}
source: Um, hey, Zero? Can I ask you a favor? {#Name="Dito"}

translation: Lemme guess: It's something stupid, right?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Lemme guess: It's something stupid, right?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: No! ...I just wanted a piggy-back ride.{#Name="Dito"}
source: No! ...I just wanted a piggy-back ride.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Like I said. Stupid.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Like I said. Stupid.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ここから落ちたら、一発で死ぬな{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ここから落ちたら、一発で死ぬな{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: すごくスリリングでいい見世物だとは思うけど、自分が見られる側に立つのは勘弁だな{#Name="ディト"}
source: すごくスリリングでいい見世物だとは思うけど、自分が見られる側に立つのは勘弁だな{#Name="ディト"}

translation: Not this stupid mutt again...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Not this stupid mutt again...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh, look. Locked in and surrounded by enemies.{LF}...AGAIN.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Oh, look. Locked in and surrounded by enemies.{LF}...AGAIN.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Couldn't you come up with something{LF}a little less cliché?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Couldn't you come up with something{LF}a little less cliché?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: What are you bitching about?{LF}And who are you bitching TO?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What are you bitching about?{LF}And who are you bitching TO?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Don't worry about it. It's complicated.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Don't worry about it. It's complicated.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Hmm. That gate looks familiar...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hmm. That gate looks familiar...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Great...a giant soldier.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Great...a giant soldier.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Think he's the owner of that mutt from before?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Think he's the owner of that mutt from before?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Don't know, don't care.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Don't know, don't care.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ま、どっちでもいいさ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ま、どっちでもいいさ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ま、どっちでもいいさ{#Name=" "}
source: ま、どっちでもいいさ{#Name=" "}

translation: また出た！{#Name="ディト"}
source: また出た！{#Name="ディト"}

translation: ああ。これは兄弟でも家族でもないな。本人だ。使い回しだ！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ああ。これは兄弟でも家族でもないな。本人だ。使い回しだ！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ここまであからさまだと、むしろ楽しいかも{#Name="ディト"}
source: ここまであからさまだと、むしろ楽しいかも{#Name="ディト"}

translation: やれやれ。ギガースに祟られたね{#Name="ディト"}
source: やれやれ。ギガースに祟られたね{#Name="ディト"}

translation: ああ、もう一生分のギガースを見た気がする{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ああ、もう一生分のギガースを見た気がする{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: 何？何？オバケでも出た？{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: 何？何？オバケでも出た？{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: オバケより怖い体験をしたよ。ある意味{#Name="ディト"}
source: オバケより怖い体験をしたよ。ある意味{#Name="ディト"}

translation: Dammit. It's cold.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Dammit. It's cold.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hey, I'd be cold too if I were dressed like that...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Hey, I'd be cold too if I were dressed like that...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I can't take it. Here, gimme your clothes.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I can't take it. Here, gimme your clothes.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: What? Why!? They won't even fit you!{#Name="Dito"}
source: What? Why!? They won't even fit you!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I'm not wearing them. I'm gonna have dummy{LF}burn 'em for warmth.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm not wearing them. I'm gonna have dummy{LF}burn 'em for warmth.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You really are a demon...{#Name="Dito"}
source: You really are a demon...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: ドラゴンは火を吐けるんだろ？{#Name="ディト"}
source: ドラゴンは火を吐けるんだろ？{#Name="ディト"}

translation: うん{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: うん{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: だったら、体の中はいつも暖かいのか？{#Name="ディト"}
source: だったら、体の中はいつも暖かいのか？{#Name="ディト"}

translation: え？どうだろう？えっと…体の中…中…暖かいかな？寒いかな？{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: え？どうだろう？えっと…体の中…中…暖かいかな？寒いかな？{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: それだけ鈍感なら、どっちでもいいんじゃない？{#Name="ディト"}
source: それだけ鈍感なら、どっちでもいいんじゃない？{#Name="ディト"}

translation: I'm sensing an Intoner's presence! Up beyond those clouds!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I'm sensing an Intoner's presence! Up beyond those clouds!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Oh, hell. The SKY? Never even considered that.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Oh, hell. The SKY? Never even considered that.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Here, get on!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Here, get on!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Ugh. It's cold and you stink, but I suppose there's no choice.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Ugh. It's cold and you stink, but I suppose there's no choice.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hey! That hurts!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Hey! That hurts!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: She's here! Zero's arrived!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: She's here! Zero's arrived!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: She's got a dragon with her!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: She's got a dragon with her!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: I never thought she'd make it here...{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: I never thought she'd make it here...{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Alert the rear guard! NOW!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Alert the rear guard! NOW!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Ah! Gyaaaaaa!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Ah! Gyaaaaaa!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Hey! Move it, you!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Hey! Move it, you!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Damn. This cold is murder on these old bones.{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Damn. This cold is murder on these old bones.{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: It ain't any easier on mine, old timer!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: It ain't any easier on mine, old timer!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: No retreat! Forward! Forwaaard!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: No retreat! Forward! Forwaaard!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: 1st Cannon Squad, forward!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: 1st Cannon Squad, forward!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Damn... Give me medicine! Please!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Damn... Give me medicine! Please!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Draw your swords! Draw your swords!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Draw your swords! Draw your swords!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: This is crazy. I can't feel my toes anymore!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: This is crazy. I can't feel my toes anymore!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Keep moving or you'll get frostbite!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Keep moving or you'll get frostbite!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Sir! The 4th squadron is blocked from the front lines by an avalanche!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Sir! The 4th squadron is blocked from the front lines by an avalanche!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Dammit! We don't have enough soldiers!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Dammit! We don't have enough soldiers!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Don't let that wretched demon touch Lady Four!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Don't let that wretched demon touch Lady Four!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Understood! We'll all charge her at once!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Understood! We'll all charge her at once!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Yes, sir!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Yes, sir!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Where are our reinforcements!?{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Where are our reinforcements!?{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: I can't see a thing!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: I can't see a thing!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Is she here!?{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Is she here!?{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Lady Four be blessed! Haaarrrgh!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Lady Four be blessed! Haaarrrgh!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: I fight for the sake of Lady Four!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: I fight for the sake of Lady Four!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Please, sir! We must fall back!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Please, sir! We must fall back!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Most of the men are too frostbitten to hold their weapons!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Most of the men are too frostbitten to hold their weapons!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Keep fighting! It's all or nothing now!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Keep fighting! It's all or nothing now!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: That guy's as strong as Zero!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: That guy's as strong as Zero!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: That's no "guy." That's a disciple!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: That's no "guy." That's a disciple!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Wha!? The demon's stealing disciples now!?{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Wha!? The demon's stealing disciples now!?{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: The jewel bearing the revered one ascends to the heavens from{LF}Mt. Bernstein of the Vice Norden, leaving a silvery shadow in its wake.{#Name="Accord"}
source: The jewel bearing the revered one ascends to the heavens from{LF}Mt. Bernstein of the Vice Norden, leaving a silvery shadow in its wake.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Following the stone's message, Zero and company made their way{LF}toward Mt. Bernstein of the Vice Norden.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Following the stone's message, Zero and company made their way{LF}toward Mt. Bernstein of the Vice Norden.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Though named for a mountain, Mt. Bernstein of the Vice Norden is actually{LF}a man-made fortress located in the deepest part of the range.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Though named for a mountain, Mt. Bernstein of the Vice Norden is actually{LF}a man-made fortress located in the deepest part of the range.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Feeling less than enthused by the length of the name{LF}"Mt. Bernstein of the Vice Norden,"{#Name="Accord"}
source: Feeling less than enthused by the length of the name{LF}"Mt. Bernstein of the Vice Norden,"{#Name="Accord"}

translation: the group decided to refer to it as "Mt. Whatever" instead.{#Name="Accord"}
source: the group decided to refer to it as "Mt. Whatever" instead.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Ugh...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Ugh...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Something wrong, Z?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Something wrong, Z?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I'm...not a fan.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm...not a fan.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Of what, heights?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Of what, heights?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: No. Just...all this stupid precision jumping.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No. Just...all this stupid precision jumping.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Dito"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You're on thin ice, buddy.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You're on thin ice, buddy.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You called!?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: You called!?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I called.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I called.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ooh, you called me! You called me!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Ooh, you called me! You called me!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Just do your thing.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Just do your thing.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Okay!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Okay!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: You've gotta be kidding me. MORE jumping?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You've gotta be kidding me. MORE jumping?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Who's the asshole who designed this place, anyway?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Who's the asshole who designed this place, anyway?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hang in there, Zero! Hang in there!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Hang in there, Zero! Hang in there!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Settle down, would you?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Settle down, would you?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You got it! I'll try double hard, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: You got it! I'll try double hard, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Is this Mt. Whatever some kind of monster lair{LF}or what?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Is this Mt. Whatever some kind of monster lair{LF}or what?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's not actually called Mt. Whatever, you know.{LF}It has a real name.{#Name="Dito"}
source: It's not actually called Mt. Whatever, you know.{LF}It has a real name.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: What was it again?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What was it again?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Uh... Mt. Ber...something.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Uh... Mt. Ber...something.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Fine. We'll call it Mt. Bersomething. Happy?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Fine. We'll call it Mt. Bersomething. Happy?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: テスト99{#Name="テスト"}
source: テスト99{#Name="テスト"}

translation: テスト100{#Name="テスト"}
source: テスト100{#Name="テスト"}

translation: テスト101{#Name="テスト"}
source: テスト101{#Name="テスト"}

translation: テスト102{#Name="テスト"}
source: テスト102{#Name="テスト"}

translation: テスト103{#Name="テスト"}
source: テスト103{#Name="テスト"}

translation: テスト104{#Name="テスト"}
source: テスト104{#Name="テスト"}

translation: テスト105{#Name="テスト"}
source: テスト105{#Name="テスト"}

translation: テスト106{#Name="テスト"}
source: テスト106{#Name="テスト"}

translation: テスト107{#Name="テスト"}
source: テスト107{#Name="テスト"}
